function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density in buildings increases the risk of virus transmission through inhalation, exhalation, and direct contact with infected objects.","Impact":"Increased probability of virus transmission and higher number of infected people in the building.","Mitigation":"Implementing an optimal occupant distribution pattern to lower the population density and reduce the risk of virus transmission.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, real-time air quality sensors, and ventilation control systems.","People":"Building occupants and visitors.","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers."},{"Description":"Reliance on climatic conditions to adjust occupant attendance for energy reduction can lead to discomfort and inconvenience for building occupants.","Impact":"Decreased occupant satisfaction and productivity, potential for overheating or underheating in different areas of the building.","Mitigation":"Integration of personalized climate control systems and real-time occupant feedback to optimize energy savings without sacrificing comfort.","Technologies":"Smart thermostat systems, occupancy tracking devices, and comfort reporting applications.","People":"Building occupants and facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners and energy management teams."}]}
